name: Cilantro Lime Rice
description: By keeping just a few ingredients on hand you'll always have the option of whipping up this light, effervescent Cilantro Lime Rice.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a dollop of oil in a saucepan on medium-high heat
recipeInstructions.name: Heat up a dollop of oil in a saucepan on medium-high heat

recipeInstructions.text: Saute 1 cup of rice in the saucepan until lightly browned
recipeInstructions.name: Saute 1 cup of rice in the saucepan until lightly browned

recipeInstructions.text: Add 2 cups of stock and 1/2 teaspoon salt to the rice

recipeInstructions.text: Bring to a boil and then reduce heat to a light simmer
recipeInstructions.name: Bring to a boil and then reduce heat to a light simmer

recipeInstructions.text: Let simmer until the liquid is absorbed
recipeInstructions.name: Let simmer until the liquid is absorbed

recipeInstructions.text: Turn off heat and cover, letting rice sit in its own steam for a few minutes

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse 1/2 bunch of cilantro and twist off the bottom stems, chopping roughly

recipeInstructions.text: Add to a blender along with 2 Tablespoons lime juice and 1 garlic clove

recipeInstructions.text: Add a couple tablespoons of water (or oil) and blend the ingredients together

recipeInstructions.text: Add the lime cilantro mixture to the cooked rice and mix thoroughly
